name: Cupertino Go Club
officers:
Wilson Lu, wlu358, President, Lead the club and officer team. Plan and prepare for all meetings.
Winston Xu, wxu108, Vice President, Assist the president in planning and execution. Serve as the president if
the president becomes unable to fulfill their duties.
Aryamaan Choudhury, achoudhury424, Secretary and Treasurer, Maintain a complete and accurate record of all
financial transactions. Take attendance at meetings and keep permanent attendance records. Maintain contact
names, addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses of club members.
Curtis Zhang, czhang562, Public Relations, Maintain social media accounts for the club. Advertise club meetings
to the school.
adjustment_policy: Selecting outstanding member if new officer is necessary. Discussion with advisor if officer fails to carry out their duties.
new_officer_application: Applications and interviews with existing officers.
